Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to membership on the state board of parole
Summary: Requires the state board of parole to include at least one member who is or was a member of law enforcement and at least one member who is a crime victim or crime victim's representative.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the membership of the state board of parole
